fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Shill: If you discard 4 cards in a phase, draw 1 extra card at the end of the phase. 
- Dirt: Learn 3 playerâ€™s roles. One (25% chance) or Two (75% chance) of the roles you learn will be wrong. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Bribery: Discard 2 cards to gain a Bonus vote. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Propaganda: Discard 2 cards to gain a Negative vote. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Blackmail: Pick a player. If they do not win with you, the next attack they make will target themselves. Gains a use for every 4 cards you discard. [0 uses, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/4]
